pinyin: Wan4 guo2 You2 zheng4 Lian2 meng2

definition: PRC postcode, e.g. 361000 for Xiamen or Amoy 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2], Fujian
Chinese postal romanization, developed in the early 1900s, used until the 1980s

sentences.english: The farmers are queuing in the Postal Savings Bank of China.
sentences.chinese: 農民們正在中國郵政儲蓄銀行排隊。

sentences.english: The position of Postmaster General went to John Wanamaker.
sentences.chinese: 香港郵政署長的立場去約翰沃納梅克。

sentences.english: Communication with France was difficult during the telephone and postal strike.
sentences.chinese: 電信與郵政部門罷工期間，與法國通訊聯繫很困難。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 掛號信件，按照國務院郵政主管部門規定的金額賠償。

sentences.english: The letters SW1 stand for a postal district of London.
sentences.chinese: SW1這幾個字母代表倫敦的郵政分區。

sentences.english: This year is also the 12th year of the French post office, La Poste, issuing Chinese New Year stamps.
sentences.chinese: 今年也是法國郵政局發行中國新年郵票第12年。

sentences.english: All the mails are sent to their destination through the provided postal service net.
sentences.chinese: 所有的郵件都通過郵政網絡寄至目的地。

sentences.english: Founded in 1969, is now the deutsche post wholly-owned and share-controlled company.
sentences.chinese: 成立於1969年，如今是德國郵政的全資控股公司。

sentences.english: I enter my zip code for what seems like the tenth time.
sentences.chinese: 我輸入了我的郵政區號，似乎像是第十遍了。

sentences.english: Instead, use a post and rail fence or woven wire horse fencing.
sentences.chinese: 相反，使用郵政和鐵路柵欄或編織線馬劍擊等。

sentences.english: Will solve the postal savings funds drawn from the rural areas over the issue.
sentences.chinese: 也就解決了郵政儲蓄從農村過度吸取資金的問題。

sentences.english: That mail-order company has been convicted of mail fraud.
sentences.chinese: 那家郵購公司被判有郵政詐騙罪。

sentences.english: Basically though, sending your work through the postal service does not provide any protection to your work at all.
sentences.chinese: 通過郵政服務寄送作品，並不能爲作品提供任何保護。

sentences.english: "Let us now is about to publish the muttering about the new" law of post.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我們焦頭爛額的是即將出臺的新《郵政法》。

sentences.english: Is a professional manufacturer of fixed-point postal equipment and cabinet business.
sentences.chinese: 是一家專業生產郵政設備和箱櫃的定點企業。

sentences.english: Underpaid mail items are subject to surcharge by Hongkong Post.
sentences.chinese: 若郵件郵資不足，香港郵政會收取欠資及相關費用。

definition: special administrative region/abbr. for 特別行政區|特别行政区
